articles.description: Columnist Graham Couch gives his initial thoughts on MSU's men's basketball team's NCAA tournament draw and anxious wait with three quick takes.
articles.content:
1. An anxious day that might be healthy for this MSU team and program
EAST LANSING The sweat was real as real as its been for Michigan State during the past 27 years.
And a sleepless night for Tom … [+5532 chars]
